description:
Want to launch multiple Palm apps by just one tap? This app allow you to do that.
This app allows you to start multiple palm apps with one tap thus avoiding several flick, select, and tap gestures.
You can do a one time configuration to select the apps to launch. Then next time simply tap the
"OneTap Launch" button and all those apps will be launched automatically.
The OneTap Launch app remembers your previous selection so you can do the selection once.
The app allows you to change this configuration anytime. The configuration screen is integrated
with the "OneTap Launch" button to allow easy configuration change.
The app is clutter free, ad free and easy to use.
This app is prefect for those of us who like to keep multiple apps open.
The app can be closed anytime and your configuration is saved 
so next time you start the app you can simply tap the 
"OneTap Launch" to invoke all those selected apps at once.
Your configuration is also retained across Palm device reboot.
